title: Super Mario 64
description: Join Mario in his 3D adventure to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser's clutches.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
description: Embark on a legendary quest as Link to stop Ganondorf and save Hyrule.

title: Final Fantasy VII
description: Experience the epic journey of Cloud Strife and his allies to stop Sephiroth and save the planet.

title: Metal Gear Solid
description: Infiltrate Shadow Moses Island and thwart the plans of the rogue terrorist group, FOXHOUND.

title: Resident Evil 2
description: Survive a zombie apocalypse in Raccoon City as Leon Kennedy and Claire Redfield.

title: Doom
description: Blast your way through hordes of demons on Mars in this iconic first-person shooter.

title: Diablo
description: Descend into the depths of the Tristram Cathedral and battle the Lord of Terror himself.

title: Street Fighter II
description: Choose your fighter and engage in fierce one-on-one battles in the ultimate martial arts tournament.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: Join Sonic on his high-speed adventures to stop Dr. Robotnik and save the animals.

title: GoldenEye 007
description: Become James Bond and thwart the plans of the evil organization, Janus.

title: Mega Man X
description: Take control of Mega Man X and battle against the Mavericks to protect humanity.

title: Star Fox 64
description: Pilot the Arwing and defend the Lylat System from the evil Andross and his forces.

title: Chrono Trigger
description: Embark on an epic time-traveling adventure to save the world from a catastrophic future.

title: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night
description: Venture into Dracula's castle and battle supernatural foes as Alucard.

title: Donkey Kong Country
description: Team up with Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong to recover their stolen banana hoard.

title: StarCraft
description: Command the forces of the Terran, Zerg, or Protoss in a galactic battle for supremacy.

title: Tekken 3
description: Enter the King of Iron Fist Tournament and prove your martial arts skills against formidable opponents.

title: Quake
description: Navigate through dark and treacherous levels, facing off against Lovecraftian horrors.

title: Secret of Mana
description: Embark on a quest to restore the power of Mana and thwart the plans of the evil empire.

title: Command & Conquer
description: Lead your chosen faction in a strategic battle for global domination.

title: Pokémon Red and Blue
description: Catch, train, and battle Pokémon as you strive to become the Pokémon Champion.

title: Half-Life
description: Uncover the mysteries of the Black Mesa Research Facility and battle alien creatures.

title: EarthBound
description: Join Ness and his friends on a quirky, humorous quest to save the world from an alien invasion.

title: Wipeout
description: Race futuristic anti-gravity ships through high-speed tracks in a battle for victory.

title: Tomb Raider
description: Explore ancient tombs and solve puzzles as the fearless archaeologist, Lara Croft.

title: Final Fantasy Tactics
description: Lead a band of warriors in a strategic battle for control of the kingdom of Ivalice.

title: Mortal Kombat II
description: Test your might in brutal one-on-one battles against iconic fighters.

title: Commander Keen
description: Join Billy Blaze, the eight-year-old genius, on intergalactic adventures to save the universe.
